column2: Folder                     Files  Parse Schema Pass  Fail  Unparse  P.Err  S.Err
Parse   = Files that passed XML parsing
Schema  = Files that reached schema validation
Pass    = Files that passed schema validation
Fail    = Files that failed schema validation
Unparse = Files with XML parsing errors
P.Err   = Number of parsing error messages
S.Err   = Number of schema error messages
